relation: Increases skill damage for the next chain skill by 20% : Cascade of Stuns
textBeforeTable: Combo Attack (Warrior) - Learned at level 1Edit Glyph list per ability Edit [show] Contents When reaching level 20, a Warrior receive 10 glyph points which they can immediately allow to any unlocked glyph. Thereafter, every level will give a single glyph point, for a total of 50 glyph points at level 60. Basic glyphs of an ability not yet learned will be disabled. Glyph points can be allocated and removed at any time while out of battle, without any cost or penalty. A player can have up to 5 saved pages of glyph to quickly change between settings. Warrior glyphs are an enhancement to Warrior skills. These glyphs cost points to activate, varying depending on the glyph. Most glyphs are automatically unlocked at level 20. The few exceptions are called Master Glyphs, which are randomly dropped from monsters.
textAfterTable: Evasive Roll (Warrior) - Learned at level 1Edit Icon Name Points Effects Glyph Type ? Glyph of the Swift 4 30% chance to increase attack speed by 15% for 10 seconds. Basic ? Glyph of Unending 4 Decreases RE consumption by 100. Basic ? Glyph of Unending 3 Decreases RE consumption by 100. Master ? Glyph of Restoration 4 Restore 3% of total HP for the next chain skill :
